user_query: I want to surprise my family with a meme-themed game night. Fetch me a random programming meme and a Chuck Norris joke with the category 'dev' to entertain them. Also, generate a Pet Pet meme using the image 'https://i.pravatar.cc/300' to create a personalized game night invitation.

TaskList.description: Fetch a Chuck Norris joke in the category 'dev'.
Generate a Pet Pet meme using the provided image URL.
